title: Google Translate website
content: How can I fix the text file icons in the website when I unchecked the "Allow pages to choose their own fonts,instead of your selections above" box? The entire website was made of text file icons like, for example, the speaker icon was named "volume_up" and the swap languages (reversible arrows cycle) icon is weirdly named "swap_horiz". It wasn't like that back in 2019 when I first brought my computer and before the last major update to the browser. So, I'm wondering, what happened in between the major updates (2019 to 2020) that cause this issue?
creator: usa13american

title: removing in bulk other peoples passwords from my machine.
content:
Where do I locate the list of saved passwords in Firefox? The current password manager (Firelock) only allows me to remove passwords one at a time.

I have over 1000 passwords on my machine 90% of them are not mine.

So please tell me where the file for saved password is om my machine so I can either delete the list completely, and start it again, or so that I can edit it with a text Editor.

This is not a Chrome machine.
creator: Itsune9tl

title: Al cerrar el navegador o la página web, Firefox me cierra sesión automáticamente ¿cómo puedo evitar esto?
content: Hola Esto es muy raro y no pasaba antes. Si tengo abierto el Facebook y estoy logueado, puedo navegar sin problemas, pero al cerrar la pestaña o cerrar el navegador, si Facebook se cierra al abrirlo otra vez me pide la contraseña de acceso, es decir, me cierra la sesión automáticamente sin haberla cerrado yo. Esto me pasa con Facebook, Twitter, Instagram y con Linkedin. Es muy molesto tener que ir logueandome cada vez que cierro una pestaña, es más, me pasa hasta con Google, porque algunas veces al cerrar la pestaña de Google, si vuelvo a entrar en Google me pide otra vez que acepte los términos de acuerdo de Google. ¿Cómo puedo evitar esto, es la primera vez que me pasa una cosa así desde que uso Firefox? Saludos
creator: mrmister23

title: Webmail won't load on firefox
content:
Hi There

My webmail will not load of Firefox. I haven't been ab;e to access my email via Firefox for over a week. I have spoken to my webmail provider and they say it's a problem with Firefox because I can access my webmail on other browsers. 

I just want to be able to access my webmail through Firefox like I use to last week. I prefer Firefox's features to other browsers.

No onw seems to be able to help me.

Thanks Carolyn
creator: carolyn_jay
